snippet.title: Pacers
snippet.description:
* 1.
Pacers
7.7
1301 King St (Payne St)
Sporting Goods •
2 tips mention "running shoes"
* Kelly B. • March 12, 2012Tim was super helpful in fitting me for new running shoes. They take the time to analyze your gait and will let you run around/on the treadmill til you find the perfect fit. def recommend.
People talk about: running clothes, gait, tuesday and thursday nights
Save

Sporting Goods •
* Amy B. • September 2, 2013City Sports brand runs a little smaller than UA and Adidas in ladies' shirts. Went to get shoes a few weeks ago and went back today for some running shorts and pants. Great service both times!

* Alyssa P. • January 17, 2012This place is great! The girl who fit me for new running shoes was so knowledgeable and helpful. I'd recommend this place to anyone who needs/wants any new sporting gear!
